title: simple fcgi.Serve(nil, handler) call crashes
body:
% go build foo.go
% ./foo
2016/02/16 04:04:09 file file+net /dev/stdin: getsockopt: socket operation on non-socket

Attached source code
[foo.go.txt](https://github.com/golang/go/files/132391/foo.go.txt)

Happens on OSX & Linux x86_64
